p: Figures 3 and 4 present the differentially expressed genes within the ASC pathway between the two atria, between the two ventricles and between the atrium and the ventricle from the same side. Figures 5 and 6 present the differentially expressed genes within the CAS pathway between the two atria, between the two ventricles and between the atrium and the ventricle from the same side. Supplementary Figs. S1– S3 present the differentially expressed genes within CMC, GLY and OPH pathways between the two atria and between the atrium and the ventricle of each side of the heart.
